Eye of the Grey Ones

miscellaneous undefined

item id [id]: 440
(spirit-sight [spiritsight], magiceye [magiceye])

Requires 5D to forge (D1)

The ancient crones known as the Grey Ones suffered millennial imprisonment. Growing older weaker two of them eventually lost eyesight. Now they share a single eye between the three of them. If stolen, the eye can be used by anyone with an eye socket. The eye grants both the ability to see spirits and the ability to see at all.
